title: Museums
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322021028/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : Museums**

Germany  
 _[Buchstaben Museum](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322021028/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Buchstaben%20Museum)

 [Klingspor Museum](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322021028/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Klingspor%20Museum)  
 [Museum fuer Druckkunst](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322021028/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Museum%20fuer%20Druckkunst)

Italy  
  _[museo bodoniano](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322021028/http:/typophile.com/wiki/www.mb-museobodoniano.it/museo.htm)

author: James Grieshaber
